item.title: About
item.description: I hold a masterâ€™s degree in Chemical Engineering and Technology from Chongqing University of Technology. During my graduate studies, my research on microbial diversity sparked my interest in bioinformatics. As the first student in my lab to explore multi-omics bioinformatics analysis, I had to teach myself everything from the ground up, which was both challenging and rewarding. Although my programming background was limited at first, I gradually built up my skills through persistent self-study.
